markdownRemark.html:
So I’ve deployed my first blog in Node.js instead of PHP. What’s involved:

  1. Gatsby.js with a blog starter
  2. gh-pages Node module to post blog updates with one CLI command, because I’m lazy
  3. GitHub Pages to host the blog (here is my GitHub)
  4. Google Domains for the .dev domain name

Purpose - to gather my webdev experience, share my version of some how-to’s which I find useful, but lacking some up-to-date info.

frontmatter.title: Hello World
frontmatter.description: Started my first blog in Node.js instead of PHP, wow.
